question: 縁起
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>edge</kanji> of <kanji>wake up</kanji> is right before you wake up. And, by wake up I mean you're about to wake up to the truth. But, you're only at the edge, so for now what you see is an <vocabulary>omen</vocabulary>... an omen that will show the truth.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Just remember that <ja>起</ja> is rendaku'd and becomes <ja>ぎ</ja> here.
